kafka.BootstrapServers: // Please put your kafka servers here
kafka.SaslKerberosPrincipal: // Please put your SaslKerberosPrincipal if Kerberos is enabled for your kafka servers    eg: serviceaccount@domain.com
kafka.SaslKerberosServiceName: // Please put your SaslKerberosServiceName if Kerberos is enabled for your kafka servers   eg: kafka
kafka.SslCaLocation: // Please put your CA certificate file path here   eg: C://Users//user_name//Documents//ca.PEM
kafka.SaslKerberosKeytab: // Please put your SaslKerberosKeytab file path here   eg: C://Users//user_name//Documents//serviceaccount.keytab
kafka.SaslKerberosKinitCmd: The Kinit Cmd as depicted in the example eg: kinit -V -k -t C://Users//user_name//Documents//serviceaccount.keytab  serviceaccount@domain.com

Topics.TopicName: // Please put your topic name here
